item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 8:15 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Playstation 2 GS emulation – the final frontier of Vulkan compute emulation (81 points | 13 comments)
3. Taming the beast that is the Django ORM – An introduction (89 points | 40 comments)

5. Did your car witness a crime? (208 points | 441 comments)

13. Brazil's X ban is sending lots of people to Bluesky (221 points | 373 comments)
14. Astronomers puzzled by little red galaxies that seem impossibly dense (52 points | 34 comments)

19. AI is growing faster than companies can secure it, warn industry leaders (20 points | 13 comments)

23. Chatbots Are Primed to Warp Reality (17 points | 14 comments)
24. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
25. The case of the nearly 7k missing pancreases (18 points | 2 comments)
26. Buy, Borrow, Die – Explained (426 points | 336 comments)

28. Solving the labyrinth puzzle from the university quest using Python (8 points | discuss)
29. Designing a Timeline for Mobile Video Editing (71 points | 9 comments)
